content: re: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/weekly.20meeting.202019-06-06.20.2354818/near/167488049 -- basically "kind of" we generally try not to actually put new commits on stable branch until the point release is a go
